title: Please Lift My Low Priority Ban
body: To start off I am writing this because your game bug splatted getting me into low priory for five games. So I just finished one off them to get into Que and have to ban a champion but when it came time to ban there where no champions to ban and caused me to dodge therefor causing me to have to wait another 20 minutes plus another 5 just to get into a game to get rid of one low q time. I doubt you will do this but i am asking you to consider lifting the low q time on my account since it wasn't my fault in the first place that i got the ban it was you new clients glitches that are causing me to miss out on extra games.

replies.body: The EXACT same thing happened to me. Its so dumb, its not our fault that league crashed!!!!

We can't adjust any leaverbuster penalties, but we _**can**_ help you fix what caused the Bug Splat which got you stuck with a low priority queue. 

Bug Splats can be caused by a number of different reasons ranging from third party programs interfering with the client to outdated hardware drivers. Let's cover all of our bases by going through the [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).
